en: Hey, #NAME. I just came by to say... goodbye, really.
You aren't the same person I used to know. You've become really stingy and grumpy and stressed...
We barely saw each other last month. I kinda thought I meant more to you than that. I'm going to get out of your hair, since that's clearly what you want from me.
You know, sometimes people change. Circumstances change.
I guess we're just at different points in our lives.
Yeah. Don't know why I expected any different.
